title: 弱弱的问一句···附魔工作台是干什么的····
author: h1997l1997

replies.author: lituo841019
replies.txt_content: 把等级换成魔法加到装备上[diamond_sword][diamond_pickaxe][diamond_hoe][diamond_shovel][diamond_axe][diamond_helmet][diamond_chestplate][diamond_leggings][diamond_boots]等等

replies.author: 可怜的孩子
replies.txt_content: 加强装备，让你打怪有感觉
